flawed_nl_solution:
Beth still needs to read 8 - 2 = <<8-2=2>>2 chapters.
She can read 1 chapter in 3/2 = <<1.5=1.5>>1.5 hours.
Therefore, she will be able to finish reading the remaining chapters in 1.5 x 2 = <<1.5*2=3>>3 hours.
